body.name: MAM Perfect Baby Pacifier, Patented Nipple, Developed with Pediatric Dentists & Orthodontists, Unisex
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 20 hrs 53 mins
features: FLEXIBLE SHAPE FOR 0-6 MONTH BABY : The nipple on these pacifiers for babies is 60% thinner and 4x more flexible than average, exerting less pressure on the mouth in order to avoid jaw deformations.
VENTILATED & COMFORTABLE SHIELD: These cute pacifiers for babies have a curved sterilizing shield with openings to keep baby comfortable, prevent moisture build-up, and allow baby’s skin to breathe.
SYMMETRICAL DESIGN: The breastfeed pacifier for babies is fun and functional. The curved shield with wide openings are always right-side up and prevent skin irritation with maximum airflow.
SELF - STERILIZING CASE: Add water and pop into the microwave to sterilize MAM silicone pacifiers 16+ months in just 3 minutes and store in case for at home and travel to protect the pacifiers.
HIGH QUALITY: Approved by 94% of babies*, our 100% BPA & BPS free orthodontic silicone pacifiers meet or exceed US safety standards and are extremely durable, while being soft and flexible.
body.description: Specially designed with your little one’s teeth and jaw in mind, the MAM Perfect Pacifier is clinically proven* to reduce the risk of open bite and increased overbite later in life. With a 60% thinner neck and 4 times more flexible nipple** than a regular pacifier, you can be assured that your little one’s favorite binky is safe for their development as it puts less pressure on their jaw and teeth. MAM’s medically engineered nipples feature life-like, SkinSoft textured silicone that feels more natural, just like mom. With multiple nipple and shield sizes to pick from, MAM nipples are easily accepted by babies of all ages, with 94% nipple acceptance among babies tested***. Babies simply love the ease and comfort of latching onto MAM nipples. Sterilize baby’s MAM pacifier in the microwave using the convenient MAM self-sterilizing storage case. Microwave disinfection is proven effective in killing common household germs and bacteria. Pacifiers kept in the closed box will remain disinfected for up to 48 hours: Fill baby pacifier case with water. Place pacifier in the pacifier case with the nipple facing down. Follow pacifier package instructions for microwave setting. Cool completely before use. *Y. Wagner, R. Heinrich-Weltzien, “Effect of a thinneck pacifier on primary dentition: a randomized controlled trial”, Orthodontics & Craniofacial Research, Volume 19, Issue 3, pages 127–136, August 2016. **Scientific reports from Wild Hi-Precision institute verify: the MAM Perfect’s teat neck is on average 60% thinner; test series by the University Clinic of Dentistry Vienna confirm: it is also on average 4 times more flexible than comparable pacifiers. (Between: 32% – 83% thinner / 1.1 – 19.5 times more flexible than regular silicone pacifiers). *** Market Research 2009-2017, tested with 1,508 babies. Please avoid leaving the pacifier in the sterilising solution for longer than the time recommended. Sometimes water may enter the inside of the nipple, this is because of a ventilation systems that exists in the nipple and helps make the pacifier orthodontic.

productInformation.name: Care instructions
productInformation.value: ‎Inspect carefully before each use. Pull the pacifier in all directions. Throw away at the first signs of damage or weakness. Only use dedicated pacifier holders tested to EN 12586. Never attach other ribbons or cords to a pacifier, your child may be strangled by them. Do not leave a pacifier in direct sunlight or near a source of heat or leave in sterilizing solution for longer than recommended, as this may weaken the nipple.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Parenting is hard. We make stuff to make it easier. MAM knows that being a parent is not always easy, so we make products that are smart and simple to use. For over 45 years we've been obsessed with making innovative pacifiers, bottles, cups, teethers, and toothbrushes, providing babies with optimal care at all stages. MAM Perfect Pacifier 2 Perfect Pacifiers with Sterilizing Case MAM's BPA/BPS-free MAM Perfect Pacifiers have been developed by leading pediatric dentists and developmental psychologists to provide maximum comfort and style for babies ages 0-6 months*. MAM’s cutting-edge pacifiers combine technological innovation and trendsetting design to help give babies a healthy start in life. *Developed in conjunction with the International Children’s Medical Research Society Perfect nipple reduces the risk of misaligned teeth Anti-slip texture helps nipple stay comfortably in baby’s mouth Curved shield allows the pacifier to sit comfortably on baby’s face Shield openings allow air to circulate and baby’s skin to breathe

Air holes in shield allow baby's skin to breathe Extra thin and flexible nipple allows room for teeth to grow SkinSoft silicone nipple offers a familiar feel Self sterilizing case sterilizes in the microwave in just 3 minutes

MAM Perfect Pacifier MAM Perfect Night Pacifier MAM Mini Air Pacifier MAM Original Pacifier MAM Original Pacifier & Clip 0-6 Nipple Size ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ SkinSoft Textured Silicone Nipple ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Textured Shield (Reduces Skin Irritation) ✓ ✓ Extra Air Exposure (For Sensitive Skin) ✓ Extra Thin & Flexible Orthodontic Nipple ✓ ✓ Quantity 2 2 2 2 2 Pacifiers & 1 Clip Includes Self-Sterilizing Box ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Glows in the Dark ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars She likes them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars There is a difference
reviews.reviewText: We have been using MAM pacifiers for years. Our oldest used them and now they are the only one our two mont old will take. This type has a different nipple shape then the regular MAM pacifiers and our son does not like them as much as the regular shape ones. Over all they are a good pacifier and that’s why I gave it 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Much better design
reviews.reviewText: My little guy would only use the green comfort pacifiers as a newborn and these are very similar to them the nipple part close to the plastic piece is smashed down and he seems to be able to latch on better with this

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars different babies like different pacifiers
reviews.reviewText: my son does take it at all. but, his buddy likes it soooo much!it's not the fault of this pacifier. it's just you need to buy different ones and try

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'd first like to say that up until yesterday, I absolutely loved these binkys. They are the only brand my son has liked since he was born. A couple months ago I read somewhere that babies who use a binky that is too small for them can inhale it and choke, so I bought a few sets of these as they are 0-6 months and he was still using newborn size. Yesterday, I put my son down for a nap with his binky in his mouth, as I always do. He is currently 5 months. I sat down in my office next to his room and immediately started hearing a strange crying noise, and I could see on the baby monitor that my son's hand was in his mouth. I ran into his room and he had this binky completely sideways stuck in his mouth trying to get it out. I had to pull it out of his mouth, probably hurting the roof of his mouth, and he was just screaming. He is fine, but it was a very scary experience. Unfortunately, I no longer feel comfortable allowing him to sleep with these binkys. Other than this experience they have been really great, but please be careful with your little ones when unsupervised!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Baby loves them
reviews.reviewText: Our baby is breast fed and she took right to the mam pacifiers. They’re the only ones she likes! I really like the sterilization container they come in. I also bought some glow in the dark ones and they’re great at night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Purchased as part of a gift for new baby
reviews.reviewText: These are nice and sturdy pacifiers. We are happy with them. We’re not sure what the new mother would like but we are confident and giving these as a gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Baby loves these
reviews.reviewText: My baby loves these and I love the little sterilising box they come in. Really happy with this.
